Sentence 1: The blood-CSF barrier plays a crucial role in protecting the central nervous system
Sentence 2: This barrier prevents harmful substances in the bloodstream from entering the cerebrospinal fluid (CSF) and subsequently the brain and spinal cord

Sentence 1: This barrier prevents harmful substances in the bloodstream from entering the cerebrospinal fluid (CSF) and subsequently the brain and spinal cord
Sentence 2: By blocking the passage of certain molecules, the barrier shields the nervous tissue from potential damage and infection

Sentence 1: By blocking the passage of certain molecules, the barrier shields the nervous tissue from potential damage and infection
Sentence 2: Without this protective mechanism, the delicate neural tissues would be vulnerable to a wide range of pathogens and toxins present in the blood

Sentence 1: Without this protective mechanism, the delicate neural tissues would be vulnerable to a wide range of pathogens and toxins present in the blood
Sentence 2: Therefore, the blood-CSF barrier is essential for maintaining the integrity and functionality of the central nervous system
